Chilblain.help: Immobilizes your target in an icy trap. Deals some damage over time and slightly Slows the target's attack and movement speed. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Chilblain.targetHelp: The Chilblain is damaging you and holding you in place. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Block_of_Ice.help: You can freeze a single foe in a Block of Ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be Slowed. Recharge: Moderate
Block_of_Ice.targetHelp: You have been frozen in a large Block of Ice. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

Ice_Blast.help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. You must be level 41 and have Chilblain or Block of Ice before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.targetHelp: The Ice Blast has reduced your Attack rate and Running speed.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Shiver.help: You can blast forth a wide cone of chilling air that dramatically Slows the movement and attack rate of nearby foes. You must be level 41 and have Chilblain or Block of Ice before selecting this power. Recharge: Slow
Shiver.targetHelp: You are shivering. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} dramatically Slows the attack speed and movement of {PlayerDest}!
You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

Ice_Storm.help: Shred your foes with this Ice Storm. This power deals a lot of damage in a large area and can Slow all affected targets movement and attack speed. You must be level 44 and have two other Arctic Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Ice_Storm.targetHelp: The Ice Storm is freezing you and reducing your Attack rate and Running speed.
